name: Woo Categories List In Footer
author: frametagmedia

sections.description: This plugin adds a list of categories or/and pages to the footer of a page using the storefront theme.
sections.installation: Install from WordPress plugin gallery or download the zip from https://frametagmedia.com.au/pluginpages/woo-categories-list-in-footer/ and install manually via the plugin upload in WordPress.
sections.faq:
email developers@frametagmedia.com.au for more information

Installation Instructions

Install from WordPress plugin gallery or download the zip from https://frametagmedia.com.au/pluginpages/woo-categories-list-in-footer/ and install manually via the plugin upload in WordPress.

short_description: This plugin adds a list of categories or/and pages to the footer of a page using the storefront theme.
description: This plugin adds a list of categories or/and pages to the footer of a page using the storefront theme.
